content.detailedDescription: I was sitting out back taking my dogs out, i started to star gaze and looked north east ish when i saw the star like object.  at first i was unsure, so i pulled up my google sky map to make sure it wasn't a planet.  from my perspective, the object was in front of the perseus constellation and no planets were near it.  after i realized it wasn't a planet, i started to record a video of the object.
content.summary: Cluster of lights, hovered, changed paths

content.detailedDescription:
If you google my name you will find information on my research.  you can also google a name i have created called electronic fog.  i am famous for a flight i made in the bermuda triangle in 1970.  i have been researching this phenomenon longer than any living person.

i have watched your hangar one tv shows and thought a segment on my experience might be of interest to you because i was teleported through space and time.  when i made this flight the first unusual thing i encountered was a huge lenticular cloud that expanded as i flew over it at an incredible rate.  one theory is that inside that cloud was what is known as a mothership because of its size.  one month after the experience i was flying back into the same area and encountered a saucer shaped ufo that entered on a collision course with me and i came within a few feet of it before it disappeared.  there definitely is a connection with ufo's and the bermuda triangle.
content.summary: I have attached an article of what i witnessed.

content.detailedDescription:
I was first aware the object was in the town where i live from a local buy and sell facebook page. someone posted a cell phone picture of it and asked if anyone else has seen it. they described it as a silver disc going slowly across the sky. a few people said they see the same thing. i started commenting on how i have seen so many ufo's here in the county. i was looking off my deck and could not find it. i put a comment asking that if anyone sees it again to please message me as soon as possible. a guy that was approximately 30 miles away in vail said he could see it hovering above the gore range. he then posted a picture with his cell phone. i got in my car with my infrared camera and drove a bit faster than the speed limit to get there, i cut the time down to get there to 25 minutes. when i first saw it i was in my car on i-70 going towards vail. i sped a little faster. as he said it was just hovering there while clouds went past it. i pulled off the highway to east vail and parked in a parking structure on the side of the highway. i was very excited to finally get my first video. i just parked my car no parking zone to get my tripod and camera set up to start recording. i got it all set up and started recording then parked my car in an actual parking space. luckily i went illegally over the speed limit because i was only able to capture the last 2 minutes it was visible before it got covered by dense clouds. now that i look at the ufo's that were on the news in breckenridge, they are very similar. i look forward to helping in any way. i believe it is kind of my mission to expose what is really going on.

i have also had a lot of other experiences that we could talk about. my very first experience that i remember was on the night of my 13th birthday. my friends and i were camping alone in our front yard in hamburg, michigan. i was young and did not think much of even knowing it was a ufo. i remember seeing 4 red lights on the top and bottom and around 6 green lights sandwiched in between the red lights. it was the closest one i have ever seen. i remember going to sleep and it was still just hovering out in this field. the object i saw when i was 22 was when it got really weird. i won't go completely into it right now but it came to me and we communicated with each other for over a month every night. this being was more malevolent that i would have liked. this event had a severe impact on me mentally and consciously. in the beginning it was absolutely horrifying to say the least but now that some time has gone past i believe it has actually helped me quite a bit. if you want to know more please just ask, i would love to get this story out and help in any way possible. it would take a very long time to describe all that has happened, would prefer to talk. i am moving away from colorado in the beginning of october though for at least 6 months so anytime before that or possibly after the 6 months if we have to.
thanks for listening!
content.summary: Captured silver glowing object with my infrared camera.

content.detailedDescription:
I was having a really hard time and had become very depressed for an extended period of time. fell asleep this night and was woken because my arm was hanging over side of bed and something was "stroking my hand". i awoke and thought it was odd my cat would be awake and rubbing up against my hand at this time of night. i turned my head and this "thing" with huge blue eyes was so close to my face that i could feel her nose touching mine. i was terrified. i whipped my hand out of hers and sat straight up in bed and screamed at her "what do you want!' within seconds she glided up from her lying down position (she had been laying long wise with her legs straight out and her head propped on her bent "elbow". and she just kinda "glided" her whole body up to a standing position. she looked at me the whole time but then turned and started "walking away" - although her "feet" never touched the ground - she was like walking / hovering about an inch above the ground. but as she started leaving, i realized i was scared at all and actually felt a warm "love-like" feeling. and i truly couldn't believe this "thing" was not going to say or do anything but leave. it kinda baffled me so i said "wait! why are you here?!" she stopped at the foot of my bed and turned to look right at me. 

[this is when i was really able to evaluate her - she had long skinny legs, long skinny arms, long skinning fingers / hands, skinny body and although she had no defining "parts" somehow i had this clear sense that it was "female" - i dont know why; huge eyes (they had a big blue iris)and a tiny tiny little pointy nose  - she did "look" like the form of pictures of aliens i have seen but her head was normal sized and she was this absolutely beautiful glowing blue color - like the color of those little lights at the airport but more clear? pure? not sure how to describe it. this blue glow reflected onto the wall on the side she was closest too and the ceiling above her, but not in front of her or onto my bed. but the glow felt "warm". the other thing that really stood out to me as i thought about it was that this "being" didnt seem to be "highly intelligent" as i had always heard and assumed. when i looked into her eyes it was as if i was looking into the eyes of a big golden lab - not stupid but not super intelligent - more like looking into the eyes of a loving, loyal dog]

now as i asked her this question, she stared at me and didnt talk, but i could "hear" everything she was saying in my head but she didnt say much. she just looked at me with these big beautiful eyes and said "sorry, gotta go!", and she turned and hover-walked down the hall. i remember i could see the blue glow reflecting onto the sides of the hall as she walked down it - and then she turned to the left, which was really odd (i had two doors to the outside - one to the right that went out to the front, which is the way everyone came and left and one to the back, which went to a little excluded backyard that no one ever used - she turned to the door to the left out to the backyard - i saw her walk to it and then poof! she was gone and so was the blue light and the warmth (this was a basement apartment) i never heard a door open or close so it was like she just walked through it. 

as i sat there stunned, i looked around to see my cat still curled in a ball sound asleep - she had never woken. i thought to my self  - was i dreaming? and decided to pinch myself in the arm - and it hurt and then my pet cat, woke briefly and then put her head down like she was exhausted. i just couldnt stop staring at the door / area where the blue lady had left - i almost expected her to come back but she never did. 

i dont know why she came to me but i did snap out of that depression the next morning and went on with life but i have never forgotten her. that was 21 years ago. 

what i would like to know is has anyone had positive experiences with these beings like i did and has anyone ever seen anything like the being i did - glowing blue lady? believe me, i was absolutely terrified when i first woke and saw her but then i just felt all this "love". is there anyone out there that experienced something like i did? anyone? i know my experience sounds "crazy" but i also am absolutely certain it was real. no doubts at all.
content.summary: "the blue lady" - big eyes, normal-sized head, long skinny arms, legs, fingers; no defined parts but sensed she was female; glowed beautiful blue

content.detailedDescription:
My family and i were staying at the edgewood resort in alexandria bay, ny. at approx. 9:45 pm on saturday 8/29 i had left one guest room and was heading back to mine, and decided to walk from our building to the main building to get a bottle of water. the main building was east and slightly south of the building we were staying in.

while walking to the main building i noticed a bright red light in the sky to the ne. it was brighter than a star, and appeared as slightly larger than a point, possibly circular or spherical. it seemed to flicker or pulsate very slightly. by its appearance i thought that it was fairly close, maybe a mile or so away. it was moving very slowly to the north when i first noticed it.

my first impulse upon seeing it was that it was possibly a low flying airplane fairly close by, however it was quickly apparent that this wasn't a plane or helicopter. there were no additional lights, and this one red light was brighter and more substantial than the typical appearance of the light on an airplane. 

as mentioned, the light also had a slight flickering or pulsating appearance, so my second assessment was that maybe this was a military flare of some sort, particularly given the close proximity of fort drum. i stopped to look at it for a moment and ponder that possibility, but a couple of things about the object made me doubt that it was a flare. first, it had been moving slowly north since i first noticed it, but soon after i stopped to look more closely it became completely stationary and maintained the same altitude that it had when i first saw it. i made it a point to find a light pole to use as a stable frame of reference, and verified that the object remained stationary for at least two minutes. second, i have seen military flares on various occasions, and there was no sign of smoke around this, or of a parachute above it, no sign of sparks, etc. and i have never seen a flare remain so perfectly stationary. third (though this was determined after the sighting was over) the object appeared to the ne of my position, and fort drum was se or even s of my position, so if this was related to a fort drum maneuver it was taking place well outside of the fort drum perimeter. 

at this point i felt a bit excited about seeing this, and thought about going back to get someone in my family to take a look. before i did that, i wanted to make sure that this wasn't possibly a light on a tower or antenna of some sort, so i walked around behind a tree and the main building to get a view of what was beyond. there were no structures beyond that were tall enough to account for this, and none of the structures had bright lights on them. when i walked around back to my original location and looked up, the object/light was gone. i moved around again to various different viewing locations/angles but there was no sign whatsoever of the light. the time between when i had looked away and then looked back to see that it was gone was no more than 30 seconds.

in conclusion, i admit that i am something of a ufo enthusiast, but i am also skeptical and inquisitive by nature. i am not the kind of person who sees an airplane at night and immediately thinks i am witnessing an alien invasion. i spend a decent amount of time looking up at the night sky, so i know what various commercial and military aircraft look like, what satellites and orbiting spacecraft look like, how to recognize various astronomical objects, etc. this particular sighting was out of the norm enough to get my attention, and doesn't seem to match anything mundane enough to where i would say with any certainty that i could explain it. of all the possible explanations, i would say that it most closely resembled some kind of flare, with the exceptions noted above. i would definitely be interested in knowing if anyone else reported this, since this was pretty early on an active night in a fairly popular resort town, and this was definitely bright enough and near enough to where i would expect someone else to have seen it.
content.summary: Bright red hovering orb/light. had slightly spherical appearance, slight pulsating quality.

content.detailedDescription: My sister and i were playing in our back garden. i was 7 years old and my sister was 3 1/2 year old at that time. it was a beautiful sunny hot afternoon. suddenly a silver object descending into our garden and it came down so low that we could see the occupants inside. 1 was male and the other was female. they both had blonde straight hair. my sister and i became very frightened because we had never seen anything like this before. we ran screaming into our back door looking back where the object hovered as low as our kitchen window. the occupants looked at each other with a confused expression and hovered for a few minutes before ascending into the sky! my sister still remembers the incident and i think about it almost everyday.
content.summary: My sister and i observed a silver ufo in our back garden 1962

content.detailedDescription: My father and i (age 25) were coming home from late-night fishing on a pier at tunica, ms. the road was very straight in that place.  on the way home we saw a large glowing oval in the distance low to the horizon down the road from us.  it hovered there over the road as we got closer and closer. at first i thought it was a blimp with lights shining onto it.  it was oval and glowed white like a fluorescent light. no surface details were visible.  we got closer and closer to it. when we got about 500 to 1000 feet from it we saw that it was hovering above a highway clover-leaf that was being constructed.  it appeared to be about 70 feet wide and 25 feet thick...And oval...Much like a blimp.  we stopped...Rolled down the windows and heard no sound...Saw no surface details. it suddenly disappeared over the horizon in a little over a second without making any sound. i was astonished at its speed and instant acceleration. at this time i was a college graduate (memphis state univ)with emphasis in biology and chemistry.  later i called the memphis airport to ask if they saw something unusual on their radar at the time of our sighting.  they said no.  it never seemed to be more than about 200 feet above the ground.
content.summary: Approached it in our car. when we were a few hundred feet away it shot away in a second

content.detailedDescription: My father and i (age 25) were coming home from late-night fishing on a pier at tunica, ms. the road was very straight in that place.  on the way home we saw a large glowing oval in the distance low to the horizon down the road from us.  it hovered there over the road as we got closer and closer. at first i thought it was a blimp with lights shining onto it.  it was oval and glowed white like a fluorescent light. no surface details were visible.  we got closer and closer to it. when we got about 500 to 1000 feet from it we saw that it was hovering above a highway clover-leaf that was being constructed.  it appeared to be about 70 feet wide and 25 feet thick...And oval...Much like a blimp.  we stopped...Rolled down the windows and heard no sound...Saw no surface details. it suddenly disappeared over the horizon in a little over a second without making any sound. i was astonished at its speed and instant acceleration. at this time i was a college graduate (memphis state univ)with emphasis in biology and chemistry.  later i called the memphis airport to ask if they saw something unusual on their radar at the time of our sighting.  they said no.  it never seemed to be more than about 200 feet above the ground.
content.summary: Approached it in our car. when we were a few hundred feet away it shot away in a second

content.detailedDescription: While driving through canada from alaska, my companion and i were on a long,lonely stretch and suddenly became aware of the surroundings being different. we both felt mentally weird, as if just waking up. we computed a missing hour, and unrealistic mileage and distance. our rv was now on the highway considerably distant from our last memory location. my companion had been abducted as a young woman, examined and chipped. we figured she was the target for a follow-up and i was just there. she was visibly upset, while i feel they are simply doing the same thing we do with animals and nature all the time. we both know that a good hypnotherapist could get a lot of details from us. and we are fine with what they are doing.
content.summary: This was an abduction figured out by our missing an hour and being relocated about 100 miles down the highway.

content.detailedDescription:
Looking out living room sliding glass window from my family's house at the above event location and saw three pulsating lights in a equilateral triangular formation hovering over one of our neighbor's homes. one of the lights began to move towards the west at a fast rate of speed while the other two remained stationary for an additional 1 to 2 minutes minutes. then the second light began to move towards the east at a slower rate of speed compared to the first object that moved.The central light remained stationary for 15 minutes then faded out of view. 

the first thought of what the objects were was that i was witnessing a re-occurrence of the "phoenix lights".

the video shows how i lost sight of the object.

i didn't have any feelings or emotions when i saw the lights either during or after the sighting.
content.summary: Looking out window and saw three pulsating lights in a triangular formation. one of the lights began to move towrds the west while the the other two remained stationary for a few minutes and then the second object began to move while third did not move.

content.detailedDescription: Sighting of two twin lights brighter than venus. they were 1 degree apart each other at 160° azimuth and 20° elevation. they had identical behavior, stationary and certainly they were not aircraft, flares or satellites. they remained at maximum brightness for 5 sec decreasing linearly (for about 10 seconds) the brightness til disappear from naked eye. see attached illustration edited on an stellarium image.
content.summary: Twin fading lights

content.detailedDescription: I casually drove up to an nighttime observation overlook, observed a bright light approx 1k ft altitude over my home neighborhood. i got out of my car to remove possibilities of reflections. after about 10 minutes, the bright light changed from hovering to instant flight with two sharp 90 turns, then disappeared upwards. i knew what it was as a reliable acquaintance was publicly mocked for reporting similar events one week prior which was reported in the eugene register guard newspaper. therefor i kept quiet, totally. frankly, i was ecstatic.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: From a buttte, observed its light hovering over my home neighborhood. then instant flight richocheting turns in direction.

content.detailedDescription:
It was at approximately 8:30pm on i believe what was the second wednesday of march as my wife was at church.  our subdivision is approx. 3 miles from ellington airfileld (decommisioned in to the 60's) which is basically a civilian/fbo field shared with nasa and the texas ang.

i have lived within 3-5 miles of the field for the better part of my 65s so i am extremely familiar with the type of crafts from civilian planes to t38s and f14/16s.  i also worked as an aerospace subcontractor for 27 years and the 15 years as a professional audio and visual sales and designer.

on the night in question i was in living room watching tv when i heard the first throaty rumble of an f16 past over at an extremely low altitude which vibrated my windows. then was a second and knowing that this type of nighttime flyover is highly unusual, i went out side and looked in the direction of ellington.

my point of view was framed by a rooftop and two large trees that formed a large upside down triangular window.  the cloud condition was low clouds illuminated by ambient surface lighting.

another low flyover, three now. while looking at the sky, against the night lighted clouds, i saw a craft that was almost transparent against the clouds. it's apparent underside was exposed to meet and there were what app reared to a row of three to four lights on each 'wing' that were almost as transparent as the craft itself.  it was like looking at a giant 'greater than' sign in the sky.  it was casually moving north-northeast and was in my viewing angle for maybe 5 impressionable seconds.

i stood still for several minutes to try to process what i have seen.  i've seen strange glowing lights in sky over my lifetime, but never did i ever imagine that i'd see an actual craft.

i am seriously hoping that someone else has filed a similar report on this night just for my own peace of mind.

respectfully,
chris thomasen, iii
content.summary: V or boomerrang shaped arial object

content.detailedDescription: My roommate called me outside to see something strange. he said he was watching them and one randomly changed directions and left at a incredible speed leaving a trail that dissipated quickly. they looked like moving stars. we saw a plane go by so we could see the difference. they wher moving south. when they would go behind the clouds you could see light reflecting on the clouds and it was bright outside. eventually one by one they disappeared. some we lost sight in the clouds and some ascended so high our eyes couldn't see them. very strange experience, definitely made me question and feel scared
content.summary: Before filmed one took off west leaving trail. 8 dots. finally just went up so far couldn't see one by one

content.detailedDescription:
Early this morning i took my dog for a walk near my place. i like to look at the stars when out that late so i was looking up as my dog sniffed around. i noticed a purplish light that switched to lime green then to pink. it was just above the railroad berm (which is about 50-100 feet high i think) and coming closer. as it came closer, my dog started whining. i took out my cell phone to video it but it was dead (after having just taken it off the charger before leaving the house 5 minutes beforehand) when i saw the phone was dead, my heart started racing and i turned to run back home. suddenly i was bathed in a greenish light along with my dog. neither of us could move!

next thing i know, i'm 400 feet from where i had been and when i got in the house, it was 2 hours later and my dog was very clingy and i was exhausted. i haven't taken a shower yet so i don't know if i have any marks or anything. 

this is not the first time i have had incidences like this. they have happened for years, since i was a small child.
content.summary: Taken onto ship

content.detailedDescription:
I was near the shore walking my dog.
i just wanted to take a look at the beautiful lake, and that's when i saw it.
i had no idea what i was seeing, at first i thought maybe it was something like a huge ballon but that wasn't it.
it was an orange sphere, kind of like an orb. it emitted and/or reflected orange light, and it's surroundings were blurred. it landed on the beach for a very brief moment, and then darted up, and suddenly flew very fast to the right and disappeared.
i was of course amazed, but also disappointed that i couldn't get it on camera.
content.summary: Orange sphere emitting and/or reflecting light. it landed for a short while and took off.

content.detailedDescription: It was almost 4am, i felt like i was having a panic attack so i decided to sit on my back steps facing south. it was quiet then i looked up and saw what appeared to be a large all black triangle. no lights. it hovered at a unknown height (seemed to be tree top) i heard a low hum and the air felt like it got warmer. then i felt a pressure, like being on a elevator. i was too scared to move, after a few moments it floated upward and shot in a southern direction. the air got cold and the pressure feeling was gone.
content.summary: A very dark triangle, no lights. just dark.

content.detailedDescription: I was on my family farm about 50 miles north of washington dc and heard a whirling sound. i looked up and saw 3 silver shiny disk shaped objects being followed by 2 f 86 jets.  they were flying toward me in a north direction and then turned east and disappeared out of sight.  my dad was a pilot and i always loved seeing airplanes that often flew over our farm which is only a few miles from camp david, maryland.   this was about 60 years ago but the memory is as clear as if it happened yesterday.   i was very young but old enough to recognize f86 fighter jets and old enough to know that what i was seeing was very unusual.
content.summary: Saw 3 disk shaped objects followed by 2 f86 jets

content.detailedDescription:
I was just ending a late night run near the forest.
i decided to look up because i have seen something before, and that's when i saw it. at first i thought it might have been a star, but it was way too big and bright of a light to be that.

there was this blinking light, like three times bigger than the largest star visible. it blinked in a sequence, once almost every two seconds. then what i immagine were clouds revealed the rest of the object, and there was a ring of lights. 

i was in awe. it was a long time since i had seen a ufo. it hovered there just for a moment and then took off. it just disappeared. one second it was there and the next it wasn't.
content.summary: A very bright light blinking, and then there revealed a ring of lights that hover there and took off.

content.detailedDescription:
I was watching the stars, in one moment i spotted a triangle object with 3 lights. when i spotted this object, i hid in a tent, i thought they were stars, it was voiceless, hovered until disappeared. i was scared.
at sunrise it merged with the sky.
content.summary: It hovered until disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: Came out of my house to look for a strange display in the sky which comes in early every morning. this display consists of what seems to be five stars. three in the center with top one slightly off center to the left. two outer ones parallel one to other, positioned between top and second center ones. comes in from the east and stops. strange thing, display does not travel across the sky as earth rotates. instead, it remains stationary, then as dawn occurs, the display appears to travel upwards into outer space. there is an underground lockheed base about two miles from my house. i'm certain all activity here has a lot to do with that base. i was looking around for other activity when i saw the sphere with a long firey tail. it only lasted about two seconds then vanished. no sound. i've seen several spheres in past years, one i caught on film. since 1993, i have photographed several ufo's around morgan. all at night except for one i caught at sunset, you can actually see the cockpit window. it made no sound, as none do and was not visible to the naked eye. i've seen so many here, that i've become bored with them. this mornings sphere, seemed to be coming out of another dimension into ours. it did not come from outer space! wrong angel for that to occur. didn't get a photo of this sphere, but i do have others i'd like to submit, especially the sunset one. i have the negatives.
content.summary: Sphere with long firey tail, almost parallel to horizon

content.detailedDescription: I just went to watch the sky i have been dealing with lights blinking at me ever other night .  now the moon is full wasnt sure i was going to watch. sat down . all of a sudded to my left a bright white - yellowish ball was moving to my right . as it got closure it was about three ships - leaving a short trail as it moved across the sky. i filmed part of it. it was amazing. incerdible. just putting it up as fast as  i can just so it is out there. i am adding to my site.
content.summary: A ball of ligfht tunred into a few ships

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 10pm. clear april night in pasadena texas. i was working at the area hospital. my car was parked on the side street next to the hospital and i went out to retrieve my lunch . as i walked to my car, i noticed a large round blue/ white solid mass in the distance. at first i didn't since movement, just a large white solid ball or mass. never taking my eyes off of it, and as i crossed the side street it was moving fast and with purpose, as if it had a place to go, and in a hurry. no sound. this ball ( if i can call it that) was traveling through the night air and came to a abrupt halt in front above of me, but above my head, approx. power line level.

i'm paralyzed at this point with wonderment and complete aw. it's the size of a large truck tire. solid blue/ white.No depth, from this angle. if looking behind the object this is when things even get weirder. 

it's pulsating. every color, a light show. then it glows solid. 2 smaller balls evolve, burnt orange in color,smaller in size. one on the left, the other on the right. crazy but in my mind i felt they were communicating with each other! after approx. 20 seconds the 2 smaller objects shot in front of the larger object. now all three in a straight line. the 2 smaller orange balls with the larger in back. and then, as fast as you can snap your fingers. they all 3 at the same time shot straight up. gone.

i feel that what ever they were. unnatural  to this earth. and it wanted me to see it. experience it. 

no way was this phenomenon "ball lightning " to big. and it was a clear night.

i sinced intelligence. purpose. and that it wanted me to experience it!

i think about every day! it has changed my life. 

we are so not alone!

thank you! it's about time i told my account! 

tammy mcbride
nurse of 18 years!
sound in body and mind.



mother of 3. grown children. 1 grand daughter.
content.flightPath: Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: White moving plasmic circular,depthless. energy.

content.detailedDescription: All i can remember is that it was about 2 or 3am and something made me feel really awake and i'm laying on my bed looking up at the ceiling because i couldn't go back to sleep and out of nowhere there was sort of what seemed like a portal on the ceiling right above my head and there were two beings looking down on me as if inspecting me. i couldn't move my body but i could move my head and eyes so i kept looking at them and they noticed i was looking back at them. from what i could see they were in what looked like an operating room peering down on me and then looking at each other in agreement by nodding as if to say to each other "this one might do just fine", after that all i could remember is this portal closing up and me waking up the next day. best example i can give is as if someone in the first floor is looking up at the second floor of a hospital and being able to see through the floor and patient table from their bed in the first floor. after that night i was just left with many questions and no answers. i was afraid to sleep for the past two days after that but while it was happening my curiosity overwhelmed my fear because of the type of person that i am i like to observe n not run away from things unless i feel i'm threatened.
content.summary: Portal opened up in middle of night n beings observed me.

content.detailedDescription: One day in 1992 i was walking to up frankford ave and i witnessed this green glowing light flying across the sky this is actually the first time i say it so i told my friends and they didn't believe me but one day we all was walking up frankford ave and i seen it again and i pointed to it we got scared and ran back to our neighborhood. i remember it flying through the sky slowly then it stopped hovered a few seconds then it shook side to side  then flew away. about 4 or 5 of us seen . a friend of mine who was there has been in prison for 20 years i recently talked to him about it and he remembers also nobody believe us but us
content.summary: It was flying through the sky then stopped a few second shook side to side then flew away

content.detailedDescription: I was driving home to richland wa from portland or with a good friend. about 2 in the morning we cross biggs junction into washington. it has no relevance i believe but about 10 minutes after the mini stonehenge we were in the middle of no where with the columbia river to our right shining bright in the clear nights moon & out of no where is a massive ufo above us. this thing was like wal-mart in the sky.  im not sure how long it was above us, seemed awhile but it was probably short. when it took off it went from hovering at our pace to instantly moving miles to completely vanishing in a straight diagonal path. it did not make a sound. after processing what just happened i said to my friend you just saw that right? he say i never believed in aliens but i  cant deny what i just saw. i could believe it, i always believed it was true. i felt & still feel blessed to experience that. just about a week after the event my friend who i experienced the ufo with stopped talking to me & still wont & its been 6 years. this was a life changing experience for us both. i no longer believe but know first hand ets are here.
content.summary: Massive disc shape with blue light super high speed to vanishing

content.detailedDescription:
My story is in several parts. since i have discovered mufon on television, i have decided to report my story. i have had an alien contact.
one night back in the fall of 1991, my wife at the time & i heard a loud humming noise outside of our bedroom. there was a very bright light that made it very difficult to see out the window.  then within about a minute or two the noise stopped and the light disappeared.  we thought it may have been a police helicopter shinning it's light looking for someone.  but, the next day my mother in law who lived about 2 miles away, said she also heard a loud humming noise and saw some bright lights, but never heard a helicopter sound or heard about any activity with the police. very strange, so we all just let it go at the time.

then about two weeks later, one night, i couldn't sleep, so i went into the living room and fell asleep in my recliner.  i was awakened by some shuffling noise or movement sounds behind me down the hallway back near the bedrooms.  i looked at the digital clock on my stereo near the television and saw that it was 4:35 am. i knew i was awake! i said "what the" and all of a sudden, i heard footsteps running toward me from behind down the hallway.  i was about to get out of my chair when this being ran by me, tapped me on the elbow and continued to run past me and turned left into another room out of my sight.
this being was about 3-4 feet in height, dark in color, with a narrow body, skinny dangly arms and fingers and it's feet were both pointed outward and appeared to be clumsy.  i was frozen in my chair and couldn't move. looking at the clock, it was now 4:36 am.  i tried to release the handle on the recliner and couldn't.  i finally yelled and pulled up on the release and i was on my feet. it is now 4:37 am and i started toward the room which was our den that had a sliding glass door.  our dog was lying on the outside and of course the door was still locked.  i flipped the light switch on, looked around the room and found nothing.  i then looked back at the clock which was now 4:38 am.  i yelled for my wife, she came running and i told her there was something in the house.  she then turned on the other lights and started looking and asked what are we looking for. the time was now 4:40 am. when i described what i saw, that was it, she thought i lost it and told me to go back to bed.  of course, she didn't believe me.

i don't know how it got into the house or out. i just know it scared the hell out of me. i talked with some people in paso robles later that week about strange ufo sightings that were in our area and was told that camp roberts which is a nearby military facility has been conducting secret operations for some time.

i was introduced to some people at a private residence that also have had ufo experiences. i told my story and was asked if the being was a dark grey or light grey.  i described it to the best of my knowledge what it looked like and was told the light greys were good and the dark greys were bad.  i never saw those people again and have hardly ever spoken about this in fear people would think i'm crazy or i imagined it.  i have told family members and a few close friends.  most now believe me! 
i didn't ever know who to report this to that would take me serious.
after watching your program on the history channel, and after almost 25 years, i believe now is the time.  thank you for listening to my story.
content.summary: Humming noise over the house about 11:30 pm.  looked out window but couldn't see because of very bright light, then disappeared quietly.

content.detailedDescription:
I remember being outside on a clear day playing with friends. i was probably about nine or ten years old. i really don't remember what month it was; however it was warm weather and this occurrence happened during the school year, probably on the weekend since the siting was seen sometime between 11:00 a.M to 4:00 p.M. i definitely know that i wasn't facing the sun.

i was standing in the front yard looking in a northern direction at the sky. my view was not obstructed from about 9 to 12 as seen on the face of a clock. from 12 to 3,the view would have been blocked by large leafy trees at that time. the weather was nice with clear skies and no wind. 

i have no idea why i was watching the sky, but suddenly a ring of fire appeared, moving across the sky at an enormous rate of speed. it was very high,not oversized, yet a very visible reddish orange fire ring. total time of visibility maybe 1 to 2 seconds. the speed of the object was so fast it moved almost across my view in that amount of time.

i believe the object appeared and disappeared as i watched the sky, unlike coming out from the tree foliage and disappearing on the horizon. from my perspective, the actual ring had some width,"hollow" in the middle, and just a little longated as opposed to a perfect circle.

the only person i reported it to was my elementary teacher. her reply: "oh,it was probably a weather balloon ". i didn't know anything about weather balloons at age nine; however, i did not believe her. she wasn't interested and quickly dismissed my observation.
content.summary: I was 9 or 10 y/o and outside playing. i must have been looking up and noticed a circular ring of  fire, which flashed across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: I was asleep in my bed.  suddenly, i awoke feeling terrified and quickly realized that i was completely paralyzed.  there was a humming sound and i felt like the air was pulsating around me.  i desperately tried to move, to cry out to my husband.  i couldn't do either.  i felt panicked and sick.  a sense of dread fell over me and i knew i wasn't alone.  my eyes were still able to move and i glanced to my left.  inches from my face was a dark object.  it almost seemed like a floating head.  i couldn't get a good look because i was immobilized and it was approximately 2am and pitch black in my room.  nevertheless, i saw the outline of a head.  even though it was dark, i could clearly see the shape of it and noticed large black eyes.  there almost seemed to be an aura around it which enabled me to see it, but i wouldn't go so far as to call it a light.  it didn't make any sense to me at all, but i knew it was alien and that it meant to cause me harm.  i was frantic, but couldn't move or scream.  i did the only thing i could think of.  spoke to it in my mind.  it never answered back.  i just kept thinking, "you are not welcome here!  go away and never come back!"  i kept screaming it in my mind over and over again.  finally, after what felt like a lifetime (probably only a minute or so), the being disappeared.  the sense of dread went away and i could move again.  i was completely in shock.  i looked out my window, but didn't see anything unusual.  i started crying, checked on my husband and our 4 year old daughter, and eventually got back in bed.  i knew that it was over, but was too shaken to fall asleep again.  i felt foolish.  it must have been a dream... but it wasn't.  there is no doubt in my mind that it happened.  i've never told a single soul.  who would believe me after all?  then, i was watching ancient aliens tonight and hangar 1 came on after.  there was a story about a woman who also reported the feeling of being paralyzed during an encounter.  i've never heard of it happening to anyone else before and i felt less alone when i heard her story.  so, i felt compelled to share mine as well in case it might help someone else.
content.summary: I awoke completely paralyzed and sensing imminent danger.  i could move my eyes only and saw a dark form not even one foot away from me.

content.detailedDescription: Me,my fiance and brother went out and eat.Upon arriving back to the apartment i turned and noticed a pair of circles with yellow orb with red around it and on top. the first 2 passed then 2 more till there were ten in all.They stayed along the bayou.Were solid in their colors and no flicker whatsoever eliminating the chance they were chinese lanterns. in fact a few months later we seen some and both said well thats that.This was one of many sightings and as a pilot and aviation expert in all aircraft its baffling the many encounters with my brothers present.These followed a bayou 100 yards away.
content.summary: Ten yellow circles surrounded by red glow were passing as though a parade..Sort of in pairs but ten in all
